T02TD2544E:13b-1: a'arya manydzu shr'i n'a ma s'a dha na /
T02TD2544E:13b-3: 'phags pa 'jam dpal zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02TD2544E:13b-5: thams cad mkhyen cing thugs su chud //
T02TD2544E:13b-6: smra ba'i skyes mchog smra ba'i rgyal //
T02TD2544E:13b-7: smra ba'i seng ge tshugs pa med //
T02TD2544E:13b-8: rnam kun mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2544E:14a-2: 'jam pa'i mgon la dga' ba dang //
T02TD2544E:14a-3: de yi don du sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02TD2544E:14a-4: mdo ru bsdus te bshad par bya //
T02TD2544E:14a-5: rnam par smin pa'i lus dag la //
T02TD2544E:14a-6: lha yi nga rgyal dran byas te //
T02TD2544E:14a-7: mdun du 'jam mgon bsams nas su //
T02TD2544E:14a-8: phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod pa dang /
T02TD2544E:14a-9: bshags dang rjes su yi rang ba //
T02TD2544E:14a-10: bsngo dang skyabs su 'gro ba dang //
T02TD2544E:14a-11: sems bskyed de ni yid kyis bya //
T02TD2544E:14a-12: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dharmm'a: sva bh'a ba shuddhonyham / brjod pas chos kun dmigs med par //
T02TD2544E:14a-13: stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya //
T02TD2544E:14a-14: sems nyid aa ru gyur nas su //
T02TD2544E:14a-15: zla dkyil dh'i: ru bsgom par bya /
T02TD2544E:14a-17: mtshan ma 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i sku //
T02TD2544E:14a-18: sku gser me tog zur phud can //
T02TD2544E:14a-19: shes rab ral gri po tis mtshan //
T02TD2544E:14a-20: zhi ba'i tshul 'chang gzhon nu bsgom //
T02TD2544E:14a-21: lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcings nas su //
T02TD2544E:14a-22: ae hye hi manydzu shr'i ku m'a ra /
T02TD2544E:14a-23: a'a karsha a'a be sha ya aa aa /
T02TD2544E:14a-24: spyan drang mdun du bsam par bya //
T02TD2544E:14a-25: de nas mchod pa dbul byas te //
T02TD2544E:14a-26: manydzu shr'i gandhe p'u dza sv'a h'a /
T02TD2544E:14a-27: aom manydzu shr'i shpe p'u dza sv'a h'a //
T02TD2544E:14a-28: aom manydzu shr'i pe p'u dza sv'a h'a //
T02TD2544E:14a-29: aom manydzu shr'i a'a lo ke p'u dza sv'a h'a /
T02TD2544E:14a-30: aom manyadzu shr'i nee bi dye p'u dza sv'a h'a /
T02TD2544E:14a-31: aom manydzu shr'i ganddhe sv'a h'a //
T02TD2544E:14a-32: de nas bstod pa'i tshig 'di brjod //
T02TD2544E:14a-33: shes rab chen po skad cig gis //
T02TD2544E:14a-34: chos kun khong du chud par mkhyen //
T02TD2544E:14a-35: mi shes g-yul ngo thams cad sel //
T02TD2544E:14a-36: sems can kun la byams thugs ldan //
T02TD2544E:14a-38: mi shes g-yul sel ral gri dang //
T02TD2544E:14a-39: shes rab po ti thugs rtags can //
T02TD2544E:14a-40: chos rnams thams cad ston pa po //
T02TD2544E:14a-41: skye mched dbyings ston zug rngu spangs //
T02TD2544E:14a-42: 'jam mgon chos sku nyid la bstod //
T02TD2544E:14a-43: yang na 'dod yon lnga sogs kyis //
T02TD2544E:14a-44: mngon par mchod nas bstod pa bya //
T02TD2544E:14a-45: yang na mtshan nyid bstod par bya //
T02TD2544E:14a-46: yon tan mtshan gyis bstod ce'o //
T02TD2544E:14a-47: de nas lus las bsdus byas nas /
T02TD2544E:14a-48: bzlas pa dag ni bya bar bshad gnyis su med pa'i thugs ka ru //
T02TD2544E:14a-49: rang 'dra'i ye shes sems dpa' bsams //
T02TD2544E:14a-50: de yi snying du ting 'dzin sems //
T02TD2544E:14a-51: nyi ma'i mandala steng du ni //
T02TD2544E:14a-52: ral gri dh'i: yis mtshan par bsam /
T02TD2544E:14a-53: de la bzlas pa'i sngags kyis bskor //
T02TD2544E:14a-54: aom badzra t'i kashna du: khatstshe da /
T02TD2544E:14b-0: dzny'a na k'a ya w'a g'i @14b shva ra aa ra pa tsa n'a ya te na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02TD2544E:14b-1: mi skyo'i sems kyis bzlas par bya //
T02TD2544E:14b-2: skyo ba dag ni byung ba na /
T02TD2544E:14b-3: 'dzin pa med pa bsgom par bya //
T02TD2544E:14b-4: thun bzhi dag tu nyams su blang //
T02TD2544E:14b-5: yang na nyin mtshan re re'o //
T02TD2544E:14b-6: tha mar gshegs su gsol ba bya //
T02TD2544E:14b-7: rang nyid lha yi nga rgyal gnas //
T02TD2544E:14b-8: 'jam mgon sgrub thabs legs sbyar bas //
T02TD2544E:14b-9: bdag gis dge ba gang bsags pa //
T02TD2544E:14b-10: des ni khams gsum sems can kun //
T02TD2544E:14b-11: 'jam mgon go 'phang thob par shog / slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
